entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Halifax
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:21 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Halifax Stanfield Int'l Airport 08:31 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 1.9°C
Wind: E 26 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to periods of snow this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
